_sText:
This is the final version for this version of the map.  I am currently working on completely redoing this map to perfect scale with every detail included in the original.  This map is a re-make of the original xbox cs_miami map.  I am still in the early stages of making maps but they are getting better. 
Now, about the map:
Counter-Terrorists: Your objective is to rescue the hostages located inside of the bank. (for servers with this map you might want to tell counter-terrorists to not spawn camp.)
Terrorists: Your goal is to prevent the counter-terrorists from rescuing the hostages.

_______________________________________
TITLE:   cs_miami_css
AUTHOR:  K!LLER^WORM (David Mann)
E-MAIL:  killerworm@sbcglobal.net
_______________________________________

DESCRIPTION:  cs_miami_css is a re-made version of the cs_miami map for the original 
Counter-strike.  cs_miami_css is a hostage rescue map that takes place in a bank.
_______________________________________

Please inform me before redistributing on CD, DVD etc.  NOT to be sold, modified or "plugged" 
into a mod without notifying me.

Have fun and enjoy!

-=Worm Maps=-

BACKGROUND: On a sunny afternoon of November 2005 a group of terrorists capture hostages in the metro, meantime the police evacuates the territory. The rescuing movement begins when special forces infiltrating the separated area by two designated points.

DESIGN PRINCIPLES: the suffix 'PRO' meant a massive reduction in files size by compressing textures and cut one of the four stations which was part of the original map layout. Back in 2010 a half gig map size was incredibly large before the steam workshop so this version was produced to address the problem after release.

STEAM WORKSHOP

BACKGROUND: On a sunny afternoon of November 2005 a group of terrorists capture hostages in the metro, meantime the police evacuates the territory. The rescuing movement begins when special forces infiltrating the separated area by two designated points.

DESIGN PRINCIPLES: Back in his universty yrs r.man decided to try to make a realistic adaptation of metro stations for Counter-Strike. The initial versions were made in 1.6 but soon the project got new grounds with CS:S with ambitious features like moving trains and escalators. These design ideas lead to the need that this map should represent studio quality visuals achieved by many hundreds of photos taken at the real locations.

STEAM WORKSHOP

You should use the nav-file that comes with the map, unless you know what you are doing.

Map provides intensive fighting.

HERE IS A NEW NAV FILE FOR THE MAP! [http://files.gamebanana.com/bitpit/cs_meridian_nav.zip](http://files.gamebanana.com/bitpit/cs_meridian_nav.zip "") cs_merididian: by K!LLER^WORM Map theme: The map takes place on a yacht in the Caribbean by the port of Tikiman's Island. There are four hostages. The map is not too large but consists of 4 total floors. You can go inside almost every room in the map (cockpit, kitchen, lounge, office, bar, flying bridge deck, and others). Read the README in the map file or press "M" while in-game to see credits to individuals for their help and use of some of their models. ________________ STORY:
A group of US Weapons Scientists were taking a "vacation"
to the Caribbean when a group of armed men took over the
ship. They are now holding the U.S. scientists hostage
and are threatening to kill them.
You now have to enter the yacht and rescue the scientists
at all costs.... don't let them be killed!! They hold
very valuable information.

Map by Julien269 - I'd like to start by thanking everyone that helped with beta testing this. It took over 8 beta tests to make it the way I wanted it and a lot of patience from the testers too :D The map is a supermarket located in Costa Rica where I used to live for a part of my life, hence the poverty ambiance that's in this project. It's a fairly medium sized map, that reminds me a bit to the good ol' cs_assault in CS 1.6. Both teams have fair starts and no team has advantage over the other. After crawling testing user-made maps, I just wasn't satisfied enough with the quality that was involved in them *bangs head on the screen*... Most of the maps totally lacked of concept in them; some were unplayable, not fun, others just plain ugly to even look at. I may not be the best mapper out there, but at least I've contributed to the community with a decent map that I think a lot of people will enjoy. The testers had a great time in it, so did I... As a final note, I'll be teaming with some highly competent concept ideators on a next upcoming project. The map will be much bigger than this one. But that's another story... There is also a dedicated server available once in a while on a 24/7 rotation with the map at the following adress: 67.68.124.160:27015 **************************************** OTHER INFORMATION Project Name: cs_mercado Started on: march 28th, 2005 Completed on: april 7th, 2005 Game: Half-Life 2 Mod: Counter-Strike: Source Aprox. total time spent on the project: 70 hours. Number of Beta tests: 8 Editor: Hammer 4.0 Developper(s): Julien269 Web Site: www.julien269.com Contact: julien269@hotmail.com ****************************************
Source: http://www.cstrike-planet.com/maps/550 Notes: This is a map from 2005, and has been running on my clan's custom map server pretty much since release. It's one of my favorite maps, even nowadays. I was suprised when I saw it wasn't on FPS Banana, so here it is. Included in the rar file is the .bsp and a bzip2 compressed version for server admins with a fast download server. Recommended # of players: 18-20 Maximum # of players: 32
Enjoy!

cs melville house
---------------------
Created by |dotslash|

An old house, once a home to forgotten grander and situated in great beauty, now lies in the middle of massive development. It’s current occupants, keen to hold on to it’s character (and thus value), have just received a letter from the local council telling them to move out or be moved out to make way for yet another massive office block.

The occupants, infuriated by the socialist local council they themselves voted for, lash out and find a stash of weapons and take six hostages from the neighbouring offices and threaten to kill everything around them unless their demands are met.

Elite counter-terrorists and the air-force are called into this delicate situation as negotiations fail and two hostages are killed. The only choice the security force have is to take action and eliminate their escape cars and all of the hostiles and of course, rescue those pesky hostages.

Let’s see who wins…
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Go to www.dot-slash.co.uk for more info.

The map got on fileplanets half life front page October/November/December 2005

Cs_medidoria

by spire


This is one of my first maps and I learned a lot from it.

It has a simple idea behind it, cover on the bottom but can be flanked from the top which dose not have much cover.
Lots of shapes, lots of fun. Hope you enjoy it.

CS_MEATLIGHT by Chris (released November 2008)

Back in 2004, when cs_twilight was released, it was quite a success. Several months later, a CSS update replaced ragdoll models and all the old ones were removed. This replacement resulted in an big ERROR message in the map.

CS_MEATLIGHT is a great remake of this fast action, ultra violent map. Chris has made some layout modifications and added a passage through the ventilation system but he kept the spirit of its famous ancestor intact.

The graphic part was also updated to today standard. Numerous custom textures are used and give an original look to this office map.

There are 32 spawn points but it is very enjoyable (and less bloody chaotic) with 8 to 10 players only. A perfect little map for big and perfect frags!

- from map review at Netday.be

Great Thanks to Chris for this Great Remake!

About Playing with Bots: Here is a manually optimized (hand-tuned) and fully place painted NAV-file (Navigation Mesh for playing against the Bots) for this map, because the embedded in .bsp original author's NAV is not fully playable slightly edited auto-gen (in particular bots don't use a ladder between the street and a balcony of office, also don't use a ventilating course from the street deadlock to a corridor of the second floor). Now bots have opportunity to use ALL walkable ways and surely move on ALL space of the map! :-)
awesomeness rescue hostages
my second map, based on a maze i found in a book lying arond my house.
Small, quickpaced map taking place around a ruined temple, look for a secret way to hide in.

Enjoy! 
And comment please ;)

Hold-up men took by storm a mini-market located in the middle of an urban city. After having liquidated the manager who refused to reveal the access to the secret vault, tension increased to such a degree that the police intervened and sealed off the surroundings. In view of the obstinacy of the latter, the hold-up men undertook to kill one hostage every 30 minutes. The various attempts to negotiate having done nothing but lead to a blood bath, the task force decides to risk a battle…

MARIHUNANA

The High Quality port of awesome Hostage Rescue map originally created by FaN for CS 1.6 and then rebuilt from scratch by Smith for CS:GO.

Story:
   The "Drug Control Organizaton" has uncovered a secret marihuana plantation, situated near the Bikini Hangout@ Mansion and has prepared a plan to raid it. It was decided that the operation would take place during the next shippment from the plantation.

Missions:
   - Counter-Terrorists: Enter Bikini Hangout@ Mansion to rescue the possible hostages and bring them to safety unharmed. Take out the Terrorists.
   - Terrorists: Take hostages or take out the CT's is only way to escape.

Other Notes: - There are 4 hostages in the mission and 3 hostage rescue zones.

Previous versions of map:
   CS 1.6 version by FaN
   CS:GO version by Smith

Explore the room I think you will like

_sText:
cs_mansion
==================
---A hostage rescue map by J4CK8 and Mikeypilk---
-------------------------------------------------

Another Cs map with this name :) I'm not creative enough to think of a new one.

Mansion is a hostage map based around an Italian mansion. The terrorists have taken over the building and are holding the hostages...well...hostage. Counter terrorists must search the building to find the 5 hostages located in and around the mansion and return them to safety. The map consists of 2 floors and a basement.

The map was created by me with help and ideas from Mikeypilk. It uses various custom textures take from the "Textures for the Real world" pack by TopHATTwaffle (http://www.gamebanana.com/members/144386) and some textures created by myself and Mikeypilk

The map includes:
- 18 Spawn points per team
- Buyzones for both teams
- 5 Hostages
- Custom materials
- Custom radar (Works but is limited*)
- Working nav file
- 3d skybox

*As the map features 2 floors, the radar cannot display both floors and therefore will only display the top floor.

To install, extract the .BSP files to your cstrike/maps folder.
This is a remake of the Map Mansion from the Game New World Order

Meh, this was the first map the ever made and really saw through to the end and took me around 3-4 weeks to finish and this is really the first time I've realy had the thought to put it up here (mainly as reference so I can look back on how shit my maps were when I first began xD). Yes, I know this map probably has about a billion flaws that you could point out with all your mapping experiance, as could I, but all I ask you, if you do leave some feedback, to judge it as a first map (since it was my first map). Try and see it as an extreamly easy way to get exemplary feedback xD. ~Enjoy!

Fav this map! Watch me as a submitter :)

This maps is based on my work experience from a year ago at a small theatre company.
i hope you enjoy it, all constructice crticism is welcome.

also, i don't know who made the custom textures, but thankyou
if you made them please tell me and i'll give you credit

Louis XVI. Hostage Rescue A map by CoCoNUT. Textures and models by Valve.

Background: The last french king - Louis XVI. and his wife Marie Antoinette weren´t cought and murdered 1791 by the french people during the revolution but spent many years in their secret castle near Paris until they died. Now the french secret service discovered secret documents about it and wants to dig out and save their bodies. Some nasty royal fanatics cought wind, want to keep the secret and took some hostages. Counter-Terrorists: Rescue all hostages.

Spawnpoints: 32, res-file included. Hand-tuned nav-file.

Extraxt all files to the Counter-Strike Source/cstrike/maps folder.

=========================================
* LEVEL INFORMATION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
TITLE                   : cs_logistic_assault_rc2
FILENAME                : cs_logistic_assault_rc2.bsp
AUTHOR                  : Bluestrike McQueen
DATE                    : 27 june 2005 
GAME                    : half-Life 2 COunter-Strike Source.
EMAIL ADDRESS           : Bluestrike@bluestrike.be
HOMEPAGE URL            : http://www.bluestrike.be
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* LEVEL DESCRIPTION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Another remake of cs_assault but I took a wider approach.
Setting is a european industrial area, Terrorists drove into a industial
building when followed by the police and took hostages,
A Counter Terrorism team is send to handle the situation.
 
NEW TEXTURES            : a few
NEW MODELS		: none

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CONSTRUCTION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MAP BASE                : Size reference of cs_assault
MAP VERSION		: build 40 (rc2 public release)
PREFABS USED            : none
EDITOR(S) USED          : Hammer 4,0 and Paint Shop Pro 
OTHER UTILITIES USED    : none 
KNOWN BUGS              : none.
 
COMPILE MACHINE         : P4 3,6MHz, 1024 DDR2 RAM, Winxp
 
compile time		: 1 hour 15 minutes
time spend on building 	: 3-4 weeks after work

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* OTHER LEVELS BY THE AUTHOR *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Too many to name but here is a pick:

cs_beirut (Counter-strike)
de_kilo (Counter-strike)

Nickrock (Farcry singleplay)
  
de_kilo II (Counter-strike Source)
cs_beirut II (Counter-Strike Source)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS / ADDITIONAL INFORMATION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CREDITS *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cryptr for the orriginal map cs_assault
CocoNuT for the improved NAV file. (http://coconut.de.tc)
Valve for their awesome game and support
Thanks to all the tutorial makers out there.
Thanks to the people who gave valuable feedback.



====================================
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You MUST NOT distribute this level UNLESS you INCLUDE THIS FILE WITH
NO MODIFICATIONS!!!. If you don't co-operate, then DON'T DISTRIBUTE
IT IN ANY FORM!!.

You can do everything you like as long as this unchanged txt file wil be includded!
ofcourse letting me know will be apreciated. 

Bluestrike, Belgium.

_aChangeLog.text: Were returned the original sound environment from "Half-Life 2", based on objects "soundscapes"
Completely re-edited the script file for "soundscapes"
Were inserted more sounds in the general environment & new ambient „targets” for “soundscapes”
Re-edited the nav paths of bots
Fixed other bugs and glitches, added nodraw textures in some places

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
- Were returned the original sound environment from "Half-Life 2", based on objects "soundscapes".
- Completely re-edited the script file for "soundscapes" (now it's inside of “.bsp”map & not change the original scripts in your CS).
- Were inserted more sounds in the general environment & new ambient „targets” for “soundscapes”.
- Re-edited the nav paths of bots.
- Added some new decals & effects.
- Re-edited the system of occluders.
- Fixed other bugs and glitches, added nodraw textures in some places.
Now this map has become even more impressive and frightening. :)

_aChangeLog.text: New small terrain around the hole in the central block
More widely edited the nav paths of bots
The whole system of occluders was re-edited
Added some decals, new brush objects, also different 3D models, sounds, new lights & glow effects
Fixed other bugs and glitches, added nodraw textures in many places

_aLatestUpdates._sText:
Update log (detailed):
- Added a 3D sky with terrain, trees & buildings (for the sky background).
- A few multilayered destructible columns (in the central block).
- A new spinning fan (in the first left block of terrorists).
- A new road system, near the demolished wall with infantry armored vehicle.
- New sounds of flies (in the ventilation block with dead bodies), which are played only at the entrance in triggers.
- New small terrain around the hole in the central block.
- More widely edited the nav paths of bots.
- The whole system of occluders was re-edited.
- Added some decals, new brush objects, also different 3D models, sounds, new lights & glow effects.
- Fixed other bugs and glitches, added nodraw textures in many places.

_sText:
Hi! I present to you the map “cs_lockdown_hotrap” for "Counter-Strike: Source".
I am game developer, but sometimes I do level design for some existing games, to gather experience or to keep fit.
This map is created on the basis of map from "Half-Life 2: Deathmatch". I removed the nonworking elements and made a playable map to "Counter-Strike: Source" (+ to "CS: GO").
So here is everything you need to play, plus special ambient sounds, new special decals and even new voice sounds.
I was able to return the original sound environment from "Half-Life 2" and also inserted more sounds in the general environment. - Now the map has become even more impressive and frightening. :)
Also I added a tactical places for snipers or for a sudden attack, plus some "landmarks" and even a map for radar, plus a 3D sky, opened additional locations, created new areas, placed a lot of new objects and edited entirely the navigation path of bots. Here on the map you will see horror places, but also fun places and elements. And of course, I created from scratch a few multilayered destructible columns. ;)
Also for this map I invented a special gameplay element, which I named as "Hot Trap" (for this, just I use existing physical objects of "Counter-Strike: Source" and "Half-Life-2").
----------------------
Credits:
Source version by Valve.
Dmitry Ghervas ("Green Way Interactive" studio) - ported/edited map of "Half-Life 2: Deathmatch" to "CS:Source".
----------------------
According to the story of this map, terrorists stormed the prison and freed the other dangerous criminals. They took as a hostages of some prison staff who survived. In order to prevent the antiterrorist forces to easily enter, the terrorists completely mined the whole prison with explosive barrels, thereby making the "hot traps".
Use these traps against the anti-terrorist forces or against the terrorists! But be careful that by yourself don`t get into the hot trap. And sometimes some bots can blow themselves these traps and may die (sometimes should clear the way for them). Pay attention, if you accidentally killed your partner, then in the next round you will not be involved.
These "hot traps" you can use in any role, importantly should learn how to use them. For this, watch the video on YouTube or experimenting at will:

I hardly worked on this map. I hope for you will be exciting to play.
Have a good hunting!

Tired of being shot in the head from 500 meters while carrying a shotgun? This map is designed in such a way that every encounter you have with an enemy will be within about 10 feet. The largest open space in the map is about 50 feet. Try playing with shotguns or pistols only. Also makes a great GunGame map.

Includes cubemaps, soundscapes, player clips, buy zones, hostages/rescue zones, nav mesh, place names, radar map, overview map (for spectating), opening text, and several puppies.

Thank you and happy killing.

-note: this map was formerly known as "cs_gg_mini_office." Although this map makes a great gungame map, it is primarily a hostage map, and so the map name was changed to avoid confusion. A few minor glitches were also fixed since that previous version.

Today i have birthday so i release my map :D

ct's start on a beach and should storm the hotel.
t's start in the office part of the hotel and should cover the hostages.
ct's can go in vents,garage or the normal way.
t's should camp.

Enjoy

This is a hostage rescue map that takes place in a little dinky part of town where terrorists "rent" an apartment with three guys in order to get money from them. The counter terrorists are sent from the local PD "Northern Patrol" where they are assigned to capture the innocent hostages of the clutches of the terrorists!

Janus has hijacked the warship La Fayette and plans to steal a tiger gunship. Based on the frigate level from goldeneye 64. Thanks to *T3cH* for the awesome helicopter prefab. This version is scaled down by 0.7 to create a more close quarters type gameplay
Janus has hijacked the warship La Fayette and has taken hostages. Based on the frigate level from Goldeneye 64 XD
A more city realistic version of cs_assault for source only.

cs_laundry (Hostage Rescue)
for Counter-Strike: Source
by Spence (http://www.rabidmnky.com)

To install, just drop the /cstrike directory into your /steamapps/youraccount/counter-strike source/ directory.

A navigation file for bots is included but no guarantees are given to how well they will actually play!
(mostly: some of them are really obsessed with the doors)

Have fun!
